short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension will try to remove the annoying clarification that Youtube puts in.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This will remove the "clarification" that youtube puts on some youtube videos, common with videos that bring up things that have gotten too "political".
